reviewText: Dancing For Him's Awakening Passion DVD is wonderful if you've ever wondered what prophetic dance ministry might looked like. It's also great if you've ever wondered what the Bible says about dance. In the first half, Pastor Lynn gives a wonderful talk about what the Bible says about dance and a teaching on the use of flags in dance ministry. This is followed by a beautiful time of ministry where Pastor Lynn ministers through dance to a congregation and then the congregation is ministered to with flags and by the Lord Himself. It's a powerful time of ministry to watch and it brings greater understanding and appreciation for how God can and wants to use dance today in the church and in the lives of individuals.

With this DVD Awakening Passion to Fulfill Destiny, it will definitely help you with understanding flags and dance in ministry. It's great for anyone who has a passion about dance you can gain a deeper knowledge about artistic ministry.

Wow! This DVD is Amazing! Pastor Lynn expresses the key to fulfilling Gods purpose for our lives. This provided confirming insight to getting back to the place of brokenness before my heavenly Father for the oil & anointing of God can flow. Brief, but powerful!!! Im speechless!
If you do not know how to minister, or manifest the Kiingdom of God through you flags, this is for YOU and your team. Great ressource.

The Awakening Passion DVD demonstrated what happens when anointed ministers of dance move and use flags -- the atmosphere is stirred for healing, destiny, and deliverance.  Includes powerful explanations of how flags can be waved as a weapon, used in a stance for warfare, to drive out the enemy, and to release a perfume of fire. Your heart will burn as you watch it!
The Awakening Passion to Fulfill your Destiny DVD is an amazing gift as it stirs up emotions in me every time I watch it.  Hallelujah!

The Awakening Passion DVD is an excellent resource to have great knowledge through biblical scriptures about flags and activation. This will give you some powerful ideas in how to touch others through the arts of flags and prophetic dance

The Awakening Passion DVD by Pastor Lynn Hayden is one Great product to have to deepen your knowledge through biblical scriptures about flags, and activation that can be done through faith through teachings.

This was an awesome demonstration of how the Power of God moves through dance and flags when used properly and the people hearts are open to receive. Great DVD! Truly a blessing to watch and be apart of the worship experience
This is such an inspirational DVD that will really touch you. This will give you some powerful ideas in how to touch others through the arts of flags and prophetic dance. You won't regret to get it.
What a Great teaching and Example of Flags!
